title: 93/497/EEC: Commission Decision of 15 September 1993 amending Decision 93/364/EEC concerning certain protection measures relating to classical swine fever in Germany
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 15 September 1993 amending Decision 93/364/EEC concerning certain protection measures relating to classical swine fever in Germany
(93/497/EEC)THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Member States shall amend the measures which they apply to trade so as to bring them into compliance with this Decision. They shall immediately inform the Commission thereof. The Decision shall be reviewed not later than 15 December 1993  taking into account the disease situation.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 September 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
